automation_needed.name: Create_Life_Event_Flow
automation_needed.purpose: To create Life Event records associated with a Contact upon user submission.
automation_needed.trigger: When a user submits a new Life Event through the UI.

automation_needed.name: Life_Event_Validation_Trigger
automation_needed.purpose: Ensures that Event Name and Event Date are populated before inserting a Life Event record.

ui_components.description: Create a user-friendly page layout for Life Event with fields: Event Name, Event Date, and Contact Lookup.
